QuestData.Title: Redistribution
QuestData.Description:
I would imagine you thought I would simply have wine to deliver.
<Deline chuckles.>
If it were that easy, his people would not be starving.
<Her expression becomes serious.>
These... loyalists, shall we say, enjoy abundance. They dance to the Magistrix's whims and so they have all that they need.
There is no Arcwine shortage. The Magistrix created one to keep us in line.
They will not miss a few bottles. They have plenty.
Search the square and bring as much as you can carry back.
QuestData.RewardText: I will see that this gets back to our friend safely. Good work.

Objectives.Objective: Bottles of Arcwine Delivered to Deline
